title: Camco TastePURE Premium Drinking Water Hose | Features a Heavy-Duty PVC Construction, Machined Fittings, Strain Relief Ends, and is Designed for RVing, Camping, Boating, and More | 35-Foot (22843)
description: The Camco TastePURE 35-Foot Premium Boat and RV Drinking Water Hose with 5/8-Inch ID is a heavy-duty water hose that is 20% thicker than our standard hoses. A no-kink design features machined fittings and strain relief ends for added durability. Made of PVC, this hose is does not have lead, BPA, or phthalate. It is NSF certified as drinking water safe, and delivers water with a no plastic taste. The hose is sun resilient for a long life. It is CSA low lead content certified and is compliant with all federal and state level Low Lead Laws. Made in the USA.
